sentence: (Video Credit: Fox News) Senate candidate Josh Mandel (R-OH) clapped back at leftist radicals and Black Lives Matter members who interrupted him and demanded that he leave a church in Cleveland because he is white during an off-the-rails debate with Democratic candidate Morgan Harper.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: Marine vet candidate puts BLM crowd in its place after being told to leave debate because he’s white

sentence: An Ohio Senate debate went off the rails as the crowd interrupted the Republican candidate, Josh Mandel, on race-based claims calling on him to leave the Black church where the event was being hosted.
title: Ohio Senate candidate hits back at 'radical leftists,' BLM members who shouted him down during debate

sentence: Subscribe to Ohio Republican Senate candidate Josh Mandel joined Fox & Friends on Wednesday to discuss the off the rails debate he and Democrat Morgan Harper had on Monday.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Josh Mandel Claims Debate Audience Hated Him Because He Was a ‘White Guy in a Black Church’
